member.name: DCOMPOSITION_OPACITY_MODE
member.summary: Specifies how the effective opacity value of a visual is applied to that visual’s content and children.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_OPACITY_MODE.DCOMPOSITION_OPACITY_MODE_LAYER
member.summary: The target visual defines a logical layer into which its entire sub-tree is composed with a starting effective opacity of 1.0. The original opacity value is then used to blend the layer onto the visual’s background.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_OPACITY_MODE.DCOMPOSITION_OPACITY_MODE_MULTIPLY
member.summary: The opacity value is multiplied with the effective opacity of the parent visual and the result is then individually applied to each piece of content in this visual’s sub-tree.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_OPACITY_MODE.DCOMPOSITION_OPACITY_MODE_INHERIT
member.summary: The opacity mode is the same as that of the target visual’s parent visual.
